item.title: Comments on HUGO site
item.description: Here I’m using Hugo theme called GoKarna but you can pretty much do this with any Hugo theme. HUGO Setup make a file with the name “rawhtml.html” in /layours.shortcodes directory of your theme and put the follwing line. *if your don’t have the shortcodes directory, you can make one. {{.Inner}} Utterances Setup Add utterances to your github repository from github.com/apps/utterances then get your HTML code from utteranc.es Add comments Now add the raw html tag followed by your HTML code from utteranc.

item.title: Hugo Server on LAN
item.description: Brief [IP-ADD] is your local IP address. Command use this command instead of “hugo server” hugo server --bind [IP-ADD] --baseURL http://[IP-ADD] Conclusion visit http://[IP-ADD] from any device on your LAN to view the temporary hugo site. that’s it ‚úåüèΩ
